definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
(Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher

sentences.english: Methods A part of 2002-2003 7-year medical students and tutors were interviewed.
sentences.chinese: 方法召开七年制学生和导师座谈会。

sentences.english: Tutorials have gained their reputation because of the close relationship they maintain between the tutor and the student.
sentences.chinese: 导师制最大的优点是学生能够得到个别指导。

sentences.english: P. S. This is a male permitted teacher by EDB.
sentences.chinese: 此男导师为教育局准用教员。

sentences.english: And also recommend my tutor"s thoughts and experience to treat this disease at the same time."
sentences.chinese: 同时介绍了导师吴克明教授治疗本病的思路和经验。

sentences.english: Pastry Chef Instructor, Institute Vatel – Hotel management, Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 曼谷，瓦岱勒酒店管理学院，面点大厨导师。

sentences.english: Lorraine Wile, a Geography tutor at St Hilda's College, posed the question.
sentences.chinese: 洛林怀尔，在圣希尔达学院地理导师提出的问题。

sentences.english: Love is a great teacher, teach us to turn over a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 爱是一位伟大的导师，教我们重新做人。

sentences.english: Women mentors will better-understand the barriers women scientists encounter in their careers.
sentences.chinese: 女导师能更好地理解女科学家在职业中遇到的障碍。

sentences.english: However, remember that they are also there as your spiritual mentors and helpers.
sentences.chinese: 但是，请记住祂们也作为着你们灵性的导师与协助者。

sentences.english: He told her that Windu was responsible for the abandonment of her former Jedi mentor.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉文崔斯温都就是该对抛弃她从前导师负责的人。

sentences.english: Xian-Chun Zhang. Pteridologist, Research professor at the Institute of Botany, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 张宪春，中国科学院植物研究所研究员，博士生导师。

sentences.english: Emotion means your mentor becomes emotionally invested in your advancement.
sentences.chinese: 激情意味着你的导师会为了你的进步而投入。

sentences.english: One teacher complimentary ticket will be provided for every 10 student tickets.
sentences.chinese: 每购买十张学生票可得导师赠券乙张。

sentences.english: The first thing you do, please talk to your recitation instructor.
sentences.chinese: 第几间你要做的事是，和你的导师好好谈谈。

sentences.english: The students have submitted their essays to their tutors.
sentences.chinese: 学生把论文递交给导师。

sentences.english: One teacher complimentary ticket will provided for every 10 student tickets.
sentences.chinese: 每购买十张学生票可得导师赠券乙张。

definition: student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
